sentences.sentence: Being happy doesn't mean everything is perfect. It means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
sentences.translation: 快乐不代表每件事都完美，而是你已下定决心让眼界超越不完美。

sentences.sentence: Youth is happy because it has the capacity to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
sentences.translation: 青春之欢愉在于发现美的能力。而所有能发现美的人，会永远年轻。

sentences.sentence: Perfection is not just about control. It's also about letting go.
sentences.translation: 完美不是控制出来的，是爆发出来的。

sentences.sentence: My friends are the most important thing in my life.
sentences.translation: 朋友是我生命中最重要的部分。

sentences.sentence: Buckle up in every seat, on every trip, every time.
